global.title: ፍራውድ
global.browsehappy: እየተጠቀሙ ያሉት <ጠንካራ> ጊዜውያለፈበት አሳሽ ነው እባክዎ የእርስዎን አሳሽ ለማሻሻል ተሞክሮዎን ለማሻሻል.

menu.jhipster-needle-menu-add-element: JHipster will add additional menu entries here (do not translate!)

entities.jhipster-needle-menu-add-entry: JHipster will add additional entities here (do not translate!)

admin.jhipster-needle-menu-add-admin-element: JHipster will add additional menu entries here (do not translate!)

authenticated.suffix:
, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").

newpassword.minlength: የይለፍ ቃልዎ ቢያንስ ከ 4 ካራክተሮች መሆን አለበት.
newpassword.maxlength: የይለፍ ቃልዎ ከ 50 ካራክተሮች በላይ መሆን አይችልም.

confirmpassword.required: የይለፍ ቃል ማረጋገጫዎ የይለፍ ቃልዎ ያስፈልጋል.
confirmpassword.minlength: የይለፍ ቃል ማረጋገጫዎ ቢያንስ 4 ካራክተሮች መሆን አለበት.
confirmpassword.maxlength: የይለፍ ቃል ማረጋገጫዎ ከ 50 ካራክተሮች በላይ መሆን አይችልም.

email.maxlength: ኢሜይልዎ ከ 50 ካራክተሮች በላይ መሆን አይችልም.

validation.max: This field cannot be more than {{ max }}.

validation.maxbytes: This field cannot be more than {{ max }} bytes.
validation.pattern: This field should follow pattern for {{ pattern }}.
validation.number: This field should be a number.
validation.datetimelocal: This field should be a date and time.
validation.patternLogin: This field can only contain letters, digits and e-mail addresses.
